Text:
It's a Tyler Perry movie, helloIcU.  Of course it's a bad movie.

Welcome to the internet, helloIcU, just about every movie torrent uses the same file naming convention, using periods instead of spaces.  If you don't like it, figure out the complicated procedure for renaming files and directories.

I m getting pissed off ... Never in my life saw a Tyler Perry movie. Yet it seems to be you either like it or hate his movie's .. BUT HOW THE FUCK DO YOU EXPLAIN QUOTATIONS AS LOW AS 1.0 TO 10+

MORONS
